【12港人關注組】

2020年8月23日，12位港人於香港東南方水域被廣東海警拘捕，並被送往深圳市鹽田看守拘留。

部分家屬已安排律師與其被拘留人士會面，但結果被拒諸門外。

事件發生至今，香港政府一直未有公佈有關港人的消息。故此，本專頁將持續跟進12位港人的情況，並將不定期發佈相關消息，希望喚起大眾對他們的持續關注。

On 23rd Aug 2020, 12 Hong Kong youths were arrested near the South-East waters from Hong Kong by the Guangdong Coast Guard and were allegedly detained at the Yantian District Detention Centre (“the Centre”) in Shenzhen.

Some of the youths' families have instructed Mainland lawyers to visit the detainees at the Centre but all lawyers have all been denied access by the authorities.

Till now, the Hong Kong government has yet to release any information relating to the 12 youths. Thus, this page will pay closest attention to the 12 youths and will release latest updates from time to time so as to arouse and maintain public awareness in this matter.

#save12hkyouths
